name: The Walking Dead: Michonne - Episode 3: What We Deserve
name_original: The Walking Dead: Michonne - Episode 3: What We Deserve
description:
The Walking Dead: Michonne - Episode 3: What We Deserve is an action-adventure game developed by Telltale Games. It came out on 26-04-2016. It was published by Telltale Games. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
The Walking Dead: Michonne - Episode 3: What We Deserve is available on PC, Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 3.
